tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr.Venkataramana is a very calm & friendly with children .He allowed my daughter to explain what all she experienced from the day she was sick till the day we went to she him.
 He ask me to wait for 1 day to go for tests for my daughter as he was sure she will feel  better next day , if not then he ask us to do some tests .
He is like our family doctor , my hubby , myself , my daughter & my mother or mother-inlaw all liked his nature of friendliness & patience .His medicines r not too costly & very effective .
I would recommend Dr.Venkataramana  for any other doctor

Very humble and down to heart.

Doctor comes with abundance of experience.

According to me srujana is best hospital, specially Dr. Venkatarama sir treat's vry wel, slowly he explains abt each problem gives best n strong treatment ....and I have visited more than 5 times to this hospital I'm well n satisfied by their treatment. Thank you so much....

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very experienced doctor. He examines patients  thoroughly and then prescribes medicinrs. Apart from medicines, he recommends excercise depending upon ailment with which patient is suffering. He gives sufficient time to each patient and explain whato do and what not to do. I and my family have been consulting Dr Venkatraman for last ten years.
very  good experience he is very professional. I would  like to visit  it again .he is so Clam and friendly

I visited the doctor on 22nd of April for my mother's pain in hand. He prescribed 3 injections and 2 medicines. The injection was given all at once *** ** * ***** *** *** my mother was feeling dizzyness and nausea since then. ***** ****** *** *********** *** ******* ******* *** *** *** ******** ******** **** * ***** *** *** ********* ******* *** *** ******* **** *** *** *********** We called the hospital but they asked me to take her to some other hospital as they were closing. We took him to some other hospital *** *** ****** **** ***** ***** ** *** ****** *********** ** *** *** ***** *********** I would not recommend this doctor to anyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,

I have been going to dr venkatramana for quite a few years now.
*** *** ********* **** ****** ****** *** *** He understands the health issues very quickly and has given the relevant treatment, which has ensured that I get relief and recover very soon.

tags: Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I had undergone surgery of pilonidal sinus last month, and lately i saw wound was looking different so i was worried about it, for which i visited dr. venkataran, he told me it is infected abit but nothing to worry, just come for dressing regularly moreover i was taking lots of medicines, he told me there is no need to take medicines now.
He was very friendly and did dressing himself.

review: Dr. Venkataramana’s prompt and accurate diagnosis is the reason he’s our go to physician for many years now.

My baby was under treatment of pediatrician for one day, but the fever dint reduce. I tried reaching our pediatric on Sunday for my surprise no pediatric was available on Sunday. I checked with my neighbors, they suggested me to meet Dr. Venkataramana at Srujana. I met him, he is very experienced Dr and he treats babies also....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Venkataramana’s prompt and accurate diagnosis is the reason he’s our go to physician for many years now.

My baby was under treatment of pediatrician for one day, but the fever dint reduce. I tried reaching our pediatric on Sunday for my surprise no pediatric was available on Sunday. I checked with my neighbors, they suggested me to meet Dr. Venkataramana at Srujana. I met him, he is very experienced Dr and he treats babies also....

The appointments start from 9AM but doctor reached around 10. My appointment was at 9.45 so I had to wait. 
Rest all was fine. Doctor was patiently listening. No unnecessary tests. Will mention the diagnosis and medicines properly. 
I'll recommend this doctor but take little late appointment.

********* ****** **** great amount of experience and wisdom. Unlike the trend today to consider tests as a mandatory starting point for diagnosis, he recommends tests only when required and is expert at doing diagnosis using a doctor's skill in checking pulse, heart beats, tongue, eyes, symptoms, etc. and does it very accurately :)

Doctor was experienced and gave possible solutions fory problem . I had an in grown toe nail which had to be removed by surgery. The surgery was done as soon as i agreed. Surgery was done properly, though i would like to mention that the nurses are very inexperienced.
